name: Smadav Virus Definitions File
summary: Learn about .LOOV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The main Smadav virus definitions is saved with the filename Smadav.loov. Updating this file automatically updates the program's virus database.

description: Database of virus definitions used by Smadav (also "SmadAV"), an Indonesian antivirus program; contains a list of virus types and is referenced when scanning files for possible viruses.
